hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

So, $\redD{7}{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 7. The long minute hand points to 12. Labels outside the edge of the clock are number 1 through 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3a056bb187a0ea1d9c4f8512f1d4d5e98bc4a8d6)

$\redD{7}{:}{\blueE{30}}$ is $\blueE{30}$ ticks from $\redD{7}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 7 and 8. The long minute hand points to 6. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d654fb4ac3b7a9eada020ab563afcf436e0e8460)

Notice the hour hand is past $7{:}00$ but not quite to $8{:}00$.

This clock shows $7{:}{30}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 7 and 8. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/62335794234ce2bb5c364a4a62ba7fc3a2c14473)

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 7 and 8. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/62335794234ce2bb5c364a4a62ba7fc3a2c14473)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 7. The long minute hand points to 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1f4742f37720109e1de68302d742bfd66c38dcb4)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 6 and 7. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/641a67082fd058116f6698cb3301ba1b8322928c)
